services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern JavaScript technologies. From React frontends to Node.js backends with database integration.

services.title: Microservices Architecture
services.description: Design and implement scalable microservices using modern patterns and technologies. GraphQL APIs, containerization, and cloud deployment.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Modern, responsive, and performant frontend applications with focus on user experience and accessibility. PWA capabilities included.

services.title: API Development
services.description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs with proper documentation, testing, and security. Integration with third-party services and payment systems.

services.title: Cloud & DevOps
services.description: Cloud infrastructure setup, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and deployment automation. Focus on AWS services and containerization.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.description: Architecture reviews, code audits, performance optimization, and technology stack recommendations for your development team.
